visual.name: PowerBI-visuals-forcasting-ARIMA
visual.description:
Time series forecasting is the use of a model to predict future values based on previously observed values. Current visual implements well known Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA) method for the forecasting. Both seasonal and non-seasonal modeling is supported. You can control the algorithm parameters and the visual attributes to suit your needs.

Service prerequisites: R-powered custom visual is used in service seamlessly

Desktop prerequisites: To run R scripts in Power BI Desktop, you must separately install R on your local computer.
You can download and install R for free from the Revolution Open download page or the CRAN Repository

R package dependencies(auto-installed): zoo, scales, forecast, reshape2, plotly, htmlWidgets, XML, caTools

Supports R versions: R 4.5.x, R 4.4.x, R 4.3.x
